description: 共同科英文（二）課程為一學期兩學分課程，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 1. 增進學生英語溝通表達能力 2. 透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神 3. 透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野 4. 透過課堂討論培養批判精神 5. 提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus:
**General English Spring 2020**

**10:20-12:10, Mondays**

Classroom: 理圖003

Instructor: 劉貞妤Chen-Yu Liu (chenyuliu1019@ntnu.edu.tw)

**Textbook:**

Keynote 4 (Available at 師大書苑)

Online resource: [http://ame.eltkeynote.com/student-book-audio/student-book-4](http://ame.eltkeynote.com/student-book-audio/student-book-4)

**Course Description and Objectives:**

This general English course is designed to enhance students’ reading, writing, listening and speaking skills. Students will be offered the opportunity to develop these 4 language skills along with critical thinking skills by presenting them with ideas from all over the world.

**Requirements & Grading policy:**

*   **Attendance and participation 20%**

Punctual attendance and active participation are required. Participation also includes teamwork and group projects.

If you are habitually late or absent, points will be deducted and you may fail this course. Exceptions are allowed only under emergent circumstances or notification in advance. Please inform me in advance through **EMAIL** if you will not be able to attend the class.

*   **Midterm: 3-minute presentation 30%**

依據師大 3分鐘英語簡報競賽規則[https://ntnuengcompetition.weebly.com/](https://ntnuengcompetition.weebly.com/)

一、多元文化議題

二、校園生活議題

三、個人專業學習領域

四、好書分享

五、其他與學術相關議題

A. Oral Presentation: 3 minutes, memorized, 1 slide (no sound)

B. Written: presentation script (turn in the typed hard copy)

*   **Video presentation 20%**

Select a topic that you want to introduce to your classmates and find an English video to help you introduce the idea. Prepare a 10-minute presentation and make sure that you select something (related to English) from the video to share with your classmates (words, idioms, culture, etc.).

Remember to share the video link and ppt slides to Moodle.

*   **Short essays 10%**

Write two short essays (at least 250 words) based on the topics assigned.

Submit your essays through Moodle before the assigned due day (Check the schedule). **LATE ASSIGNMENTS WILL NOT BE GRADED.**

*   **Final oral test 10%**

You are expected to read a passage fluently and answer questions based on the textbook.

*   **Lexile test 10%**

請參閱各系英語畢業門檻 Lexile分數規定\* (沒有校門檻)

個人目標: 比前學期進步 50 分

*   **Bonus 5%**

Self-study portfolio: Submit a summary to show me what you do at the end of the semester. Include date, activity, and any other details you would like to include.

1.  Participation in English activities on or off campus

例如:英語自學教室(樸101) (開放時間：109年 3月16日 至 109年 6月 24日; 週一至週五09:30-17:00)、自學獎勵活動(樸 101門口電子看板)、英語工作坊

2\. Participation in NTNU 3-minute Presentation Contest
